title: Neurosculpt Your Future
body: Does your traditional meditation fall short in granting you greater agency over your life? After facing a life-threatening seizure disorder, Lisa Wimberger courageously decided to create a revolutionary neuro-plasticity protocol. This approach creates the perfect conditions for mental mastery and nervous system regulation.
teaser: Take control of your life with Neurosculpting, a revolutionary global healing modality created by Founder and CEO Lisa Wimberger.

title: Pelvic Floor Rescue
body: Pelvic floor dysfunction affects 1 in 3 women, yet the silence surrounding this issue has impeded further research development until now. Jana Danielson takes the lead in initiating a shift in this conversation and unveils her 3 B method for pelvic floor rescue.
teaser: Jana Danielson takes the initiative to change the conversation about the pelvic floor and introduces her 3 B method to deliver immediate relief.

title: Small Daily Changes for Lifelong Vitality
body: As a woman, are you grappling with irritability, a lack of joy, and challenges in concentration? By the age of 40, we lose 10 neurochemicals. Dr. Mindy Pelz sheds light on lifestyle changes to reclaim these lost neurochemicals and unleash lifelong vitality.
teaser: As a woman, are you grappling with irritability, a lack of joy, and challenges in concentration?

title: Aging Illuminated: Urolithin
body: Unlocking the secrets to optimizing the aging process has long been a subject of research. Jennifer Scheinman, however, discovered an answer that goes beyond adding more years to our life – it adds more life to our years. She introduces a metabolite compound called Urolithin as the key to aging well.
teaser: Jennifer Scheinman discovers an answer that goes beyond adding more years to our life – it adds more life to our years. She introduces a metabolite compound called Urolithin as the key to aging well.

title: Inflammation Reduction Strategies
body: Say goodbye to the one-size-fits-all paradigm of health. Lindsay O’Neil boldly asserts her statement with bio-individual data. Explore the realm of optimal health through bio-energetic technology, strategically designed to diminish the body’s inflammatory responses.
teaser: Lindsay O’Neil ventures into the realm of optimal health with bio-energetic technology, strategically designed to alleviate the body’s inflammatory responses.

title: Investing in Women's Health
body: To start bridging the gap in women’s healthcare, we must redefine the concept of capital. In this enLightening Talk from Dragonfly LIVE 2023, Naseem Sayani illuminates the crucial role of investing in women. With over 20 years of diverse leadership experience, Naseem, Co-Founder and Managing Director at Emmeline Ventures, is dedicated to unlocking new capital for female founders. Join her captivating talk as she delves into the ripple effects of women's involvement in venture capital, illuminating how their contributions shape our everyday lives. Discover how women can harness their financial resources through angel and venture investing, and become catalysts for change in the realm of wellness and beyond.
teaser: Join Naseem Sayani as she explores how women can leverage their financial resources through angel and venture investing, becoming catalysts for change in the realm of wellness and beyond.

title: Stem Cell Secrets
body: If we have the ability to put more stem cells into circulation, can we change the course of disease development? Stem Cell Scientist Christian Drapeau dives into the secrets of regenerative potential, exploring the profound impact and limitations of these extraordinary cells in repairing the body. Forge a path toward sustained health that extends beyond decades.
teaser: Stem Cell Scientist Christian Drapeau dives into the secrets of regenerative potential, exploring the profound impact and limitations of these extraordinary cells in repairing the body.

title: Rewind Your Biological Clock
body: Dr. Katherine Zagone debunks the misconception surrounding fertility and its association with chronological age, stressing the utmost importance of biological age. With her pioneering FAST framework, she shares a roadmap to reverse biological aging by 4 years in just 1, showcasing the potential for anyone to reclaim control over their fertility timeline.
teaser: Dr. Katherine Zagone debunks the misconception surrounding fertility and its association with chronological age, stressing the utmost importance of biological age.

title: Metabolic Health: Crisis to Control
body: Our bodies navigate an environment saturated with technological exposure, genetically modified foods, and the allure of convenience—an environment not conducive to our well-being. Chronic health symptoms serve as clear indicators that something is awry. Kara Collier asserts that despite the multitude of challenges we face, there's hope—we can reclaim our power through the use of continuous glucose monitors. This technology offers personalized, meaningful metrics that work with our internal reward system rather than oppose it.
teaser: Chronic health symptoms serve as clear indicators that something is awry. Kara Collier asserts that despite the multitude of challenges we face, there's hope—we can reclaim our power through the use of continuous glucose monitors.

title: Infrared & Vitality
body: Connie Zach's groundbreaking scientific revelations regarding infrared saunas shed light on their remarkable potential for restoration and wellness. Her research unveils the transformative capabilities of this singular health technology, offering profound insights into detoxification, cognitive enhancement, inflammation mitigation, and cellular activation. Explore the depths of her discoveries to grasp the extensive implications of incorporating infrared saunas into holistic health routines, heralding a remarkable shift in wellness methodologies.
teaser: Connie Zach's groundbreaking scientific revelations regarding infrared saunas shed light on their remarkable potential for restoration and wellness.

title: Nervous System Regulation
body:
Is it possible that stress be relieved in just 20 minutes a day? Katrine Volynsky shares her journey of overcoming radiation treatment, handling an unplanned pregnancy, and the trials of single motherhood, while introducing a new technological approach to regulating the nervous system.

Upon discovering pulsed electromagnetic field therapy technology, Volynsky found improved stress management, more joyful moments with her child, and a transformation towards a more beautiful, resilient, and calm life. She suggests that utilizing PEMF technology can help you go from fight or flight to rest and digest. It also offers benefits such as reducing inflammation, increasing GABA levels, enhancing metabolism, promoting bone healing, and boosting energy.  Although life often brings stress, breaking free from its constant grip is achievable.
teaser: Is it possible that stress be relieved in just 20 minutes a day? Katrine Volynsky shares her journey of overcoming radiation treatment, handling an unplanned pregnancy, and the trials of single motherhood, while introducing a new technological approach to regulating the nervous system.

title: Mastering Safety & Threat Signals
body: Can we effectively retrain our threat detection network to help us heal? Dr. Olivia Lesslar shares how her encounter with a patient who had two leaking mercury amalgam fillings sparked her curiosity about the response of the neuroimmune system and its effect on our health and healing. Through extensive study with her patient, she came to understand how grasping guardian sites can aid us in rewiring and mastering our safety responses. As our bodies absorb information, evaluate risks, and activate protective mechanisms, we gain insight into what is necessary to modify our internal systems to restore balance.
teaser: Can we retrain our threat detection network to help us heal? Dr. Olivia Lesslar suggests that as our bodies absorb information, evaluate risks, and activate protective mechanisms, we gain insight into what is necessary to modify our internal systems.

title: Estrogen: Hormonal Root
body:
Is it possible that the often-vilified hormone, estrogen, might be the unsung hero of hormone regulation? 

Hormone Expert, Carrie Jones, courageously challenges prevailing notions, bringing clarity to controversy and dispelling misinformation around hormones. Through her advocacy, she invites us to adopt a more nuanced and comprehensive perspective on the intricate balance of hormones, shedding light on the pivotal role estrogen plays in maintaining overall health and well-being.
teaser: Is it possible that the often-vilified hormone, estrogen, might be the unsung hero of hormone regulation? Carrie Jones courageously challenges prevailing notions, bringing clarity to controversy and dispelling misinformation about hormones.

title: Biosyncing for Peak Performance
body:
Is there a smarter way to achieve success? Angela Foster introduces BioSyncing, a cutting-edge process to unlock unparalleled high performance in both business and life.

In this talk, you’ll learn about your female physiology, embrace bio-individuality, and sync with your future self to avoid burnout with Angela Foster, peak performance coach.
teaser: Is there a smarter way to achieve success? Angela Foster introduces BioSyncing, a cutting-edge process to unlock unparalleled high performance in both business and life.

title: Your Body's Peptide Potential
body:
Could the most powerful protein within your body hold the secret to longevity? Delve into hidden treasure within your body with nutritionist Nathalie Niddam. 

Niddam sheds light on peptides, a regulating protein that infiltrates cells and nuclei, binding to DNA and enhancing protein production in tissues, glands, and organs. This protein is not only anti-stress and anti-cancer but also has the potential to restore DNA telomeres. 

Explore how these minute proteins can ignite transformative healing and rejuvenation at a cellular level, fostering vibrant health, enhanced performance, and an extended health span.
teaser: Could the most powerful protein within your body hold the secret to longevity? Delve into hidden treasure within your body with nutritionist Nathalie Niddam.

title: Nitric Oxide: Health Elixir?
body:
What are the long-term effects of having low levels of nitric oxide in the body?

The body's ability to heal hinges on the presence of nitric oxide (NO). Devoid of NO, inflammation escalates, oxidative stress ensues, and immune function falters. Conversely, when the body receives an adequate supply of NO, its innate healing mechanisms spring into action. Dr. Nathan Bryan explores how the body produces nitric oxide, the consequences of its deficiency, and provides strategies for boosting its production.
teaser: What are the long-term effects of having low levels of nitric oxide in the body? Dr. Nathan Bryan delves into the intricate processes by which the body synthesizes nitric oxide to support our innate healing mechanisms.

title: Navigating Cold Exposure
body:
Break free from the freeze response with Adrienne Jezick, who shares how to stay calm during an ice bath and master composure in everyday life. 

By forging a deeper bond with your body's nervous system, you gain a powerful ally for overcoming life's hurdles with greater resilience and grace. Discover how embracing this relationship can serve as a catalyst for transformative growth, empowering you to navigate life's challenges with newfound ease and confidence.
teaser: Break free from the freeze response with Adrienne Jezick, who shares how to stay calm during an ice bath so that you can master composure in everyday life.

title: Trauma & Quantum Possibilities
body: Dr. Carly Lezt recounts her journey with stress, shifting from a state of fight or flight to one of recovery and emotional healing. She suggests that prioritizing rest and embracing our connection to the bound energy within our bodies can help liberate trauma. This liberation allows us to access a gateway to the quantum realm, uncovering new facets of ourselves and potential for healing.
teaser: Dr. Carly Lezt shares her journey with stress, affirming that prioritizing rest and connecting with your body's bound energy can liberate trauma and grant access to the quantum realm, uncovering new facets of ourselves and potential for healing.

title: Cracking Codes of Aging Weight
body: Understanding the link between aging and healthy weight is crucial, as hormonal shifts in our mid-30s to 40s complicate weight management. Karen Martel reveals how a decline in hormones like progesterone, estradiol, testosterone, and thyroid reduce the effectiveness of traditional diet and exercise. She advocates for a hormonal perspective, highlighting hormone replacement therapy (HRT) and stress management. By addressing these changes with bioidentical hormone therapy, we can better manage aging-related weight challenges and improve overall well-being.
teaser: Understanding the link between aging and healthy weight is crucial, as hormonal shifts in our mid-30s to 40s complicate weight management. Karen Martel reveals hormone decline challenges and solutions for managing weight with ease.

title: Earth: A Sacred Prayer
body: Nawat and Mexican American Transformational Leader, Anita Sanchez shares a wisdom-filled story from her grandmother and invites us to reconnect with nature through a sacred four-directional prayer. She recounts childhood memories of observing sunflowers turning toward the sun and then toward each other in darkness. Sanchez parallels our innate desire to seek light and offers a moment for reflection and harmony. Aho.
teaser: Nawat and Mexican American Transformational Leader, Anita Sanchez shares a wisdom-filled story from her grandmother and invites us to reconnect with nature through a sacred four-directional prayer.

title: Insights on Conceiving
body: How does what we ingest now affect the health of our grandchildren? Dr. Mary Shackelton highlights the urgent need to rethink health strategies before conception. She examines the alarming rise in cognitive dysfunction and neurological issues in younger patients, exploring the impact of environmental factors on women's health. Dr. Mary offers proactive solutions to reduce toxic burdens and enhance detoxification, empowering individuals to protect their health and that of future generations.
teaser: How does what we ingest now affect the health of our grandchildren? Dr. Mary offers proactive solutions to reduce toxic burdens and enhance detoxification, empowering individuals to protect their health for conception and that of future generations.

title: Light & Sleep Skills
body:
How does daily lightbulb exposure affect our sleep? Discover how to use technology, accountability, and behavioral changes to optimize your sleep and life with Mollie Eastman.

In today's world, sleep is a crucial skill. With sleep deprivation at an all-time high, it's essential to re-learn the skills for exceptional sleep. Explore the latest chronobiology and biorhythm research to find practical methods to improve sleep.
teaser: How does daily lightbulb exposure affect our sleep? Discover how to use technology and behavioral changes to optimize your sleep and life with Mollie Eastman.

title: Gut Brain Health
body:
How many of our decisions are influenced by the bacteria in our microbiome rather than by our own conscious thought? 

In this captivating talk, Sarah Turner, CEO of CeraThrive, delves into the mind-body connection and the role of our 'second brain', the gut, in shaping our physical and mental well-being. Drawing from her background in neuroscience and extensive research, Sarah discusses the transformative power of photobiomodulation (PBM) in optimizing our bodies' function. Her insights reveal how harnessing light can revolutionize health, offering a powerful tool for enhancing our quality of life.
teaser: How many of our decisions are influenced by the bacteria in our microbiome rather than by our own conscious thought? Sarah Turner, CEO of CeraThrive, delves into the role of our gut in shaping our physical and mental well-being.

title: Biohacking: Simple Steps for Healing
body:
How can simple biohacking practices be used to create a life of magic?

After experiencing the tragic loss of her father and severe health diagnoses for both her mother and herself, holistic practitioner Megha Gupta realized the need for a significant change. In this talk, Gupta shares the biohacking tips that helped her reverse her diabetes and improve her overall health. She asserts that practicing earthing, journaling, and forgiveness can radically transform your life.
teaser: How can simple biohacking practices be used to help you create a life of magic? Holistic practitioner Megha Gupta shares practical biohacking tips that helped her reverse her diabetes and improve her overall health.

title: Restore Your Nervous system
body:
How can you reactivate your original blueprint for health and well-being? Fascia Fitness Coach Nikki Costello explores the deep connection between your fascial system and nervous system, revealing what might be blocking your path to balance.

She highlights how the health of the fascial system impacts every function in your body and why it must be the priority on any health journey whether you're seeking to resolve pain, overcome depression, or balance your hormones.
teaser: How can you reactivate your original blueprint for health and well-being? Fascia Fitness Coach, Nikki Costello, explores the intimate connection between the fascial matrix and your nervous system.

title: Harnessing Frequency Medicine
body:
What if you could instantly connect with the Source and elevate your consciousness? 

Conscious entrepreneur and energy healer Philip Von Holtzendorff-Fehling shares how accessing quantum energy can impact your well-being and unlock new possibilities for a healthier, more vibrant life. Von Holtzendorff-Fehling shares breakthroughs using this internal technology and the profound transformative effects it can have on your health, relationships, and career.
teaser: What if you could instantly connect with the Source and elevate your consciousness? Discover how quantum energy impacts your well-being and unlocks new possibilities for a healthier, more vibrant life with Philip Von Holtzendorff-Fehling.

title: Elevating Mental Potential
body: Dr. Patrick Porter, a leading expert in neuro-technology and brainwave entrainment, delves into advanced techniques for boosting mental performance. He explores how brainwave entrainment influences our energy field and explains how the body absorbs vibratory information. By integrating ancient wisdom with modern technology, Porter reveals methods to enhance mental clarity, focus, and productivity.
teaser: Leading expert in neuro-technology and brainwave entrainment, Dr. Patrick Porter, delves into integrating ancient and modern technology to boost mental performance.

title: The Science of Youthful Skin
body:
Is it possible we can reverse aging by reducing the number of zombie cells?

Dr. Carolina Reis de Oliveira discusses the discovery of the OS-01 peptide, which can reduce damaged cells, also called zombie cells, by 40% and reverse biological age. She explains how this breakthrough allows cells to replicate and promote rejuvenation from the inside out with a targeted and effective approach. This not only enhances your appearance but also improves your overall health.
teaser: Could it be possible to reverse aging by reducing the number of zombie cells in your body? Dr. Carolina Reis de Oliveira discusses the discovery of the OS-01 peptide, which can reduce zombie cells by 40% and reverse biological age.

title: The Magic of Minerals
body:
How significantly does a deficiency in essential minerals contribute to chronic health issues?

Caroline Alan sheds light on the mysteries and misconceptions surrounding minerals. She explores their vital role in the body, the impact of mineral depletion on chronic illness, and how the body replenishes these crucial elements. With approximately 37 trillion cells in the human body, each relying on minerals for its fundamental functions, it’s time we incorporate these simple shifts in our health regime.
teaser: How significantly does a deficiency in essential minerals contribute to chronic health issues?

title: Thyroid Health & Weight Loss
body:
What is one of the most crucial aspects to focus on for maintaining good health, aside from eating well?

Dr. Amie Hornaman emphasizes the often overlooked role of the thyroid in women's health through stories about weight gain, dismissed symptoms, and medical challenges. She challenges health beliefs, urging women to proactively advocate for their thyroid health and prioritize it as a foundational step on their health journey. Stressing the crucial importance of addressing thyroid issues for overall well-being, she shares that it extends beyond weight to impact energy levels, brain function, and vitality.
teaser: What is one of the most crucial aspects to focus on for maintaining good health, aside from eating well? Dr. Amie Hornaman stresses the importance of addressing thyroid issues for energy levels, brain function, and vitality.

title: Change Your State with Self Awareness
body:
Self-awareness is often overlooked, a struggle to attain, or unclear. Could this be why so many of us feel disconnected from our true potential and unable to make lasting changes in our lives?

Kristen McAdams breaks down this vital concept by introducing self-awareness as a powerful nervous system technique. She guides you through a core integration tool to reveal how interoception, our ability to sense internal bodily states, can be harnessed to master self-awareness. By understanding the interplay between our "software and hardware," the mind and the nervous system, you'll learn to navigate the 6 different nervous system states and develop embodied awareness.
teaser: Self-awareness is often overlooked, a struggle to attain, or unclear. Could this be why so many of us feel disconnected from our true potential and unable to make lasting changes in our lives?

title: Why Blood Sugar is Not Just for Diabetics
body:
Is monitoring blood sugar only crucial for those with diabetes?

Danielle Hamilton examines the subtle early signs of blood sugar issues and their broader impact on overall health. She highlights the importance of blood sugar balance for well-being beyond diabetes. Tune in to learn practical strategies for achieving and maintaining optimal blood sugar levels and gain valuable insights into how these dynamics affect your health.
teaser: Is monitoring blood sugar only crucial for those with diabetes? Danielle Hamilton examines the subtle early signs of blood sugar issues and their broader impact on overall health.
